document_data.name: Greater stoneskin
document_data.mainbody: '''''Greater stoneskin''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[druid]]s, [[sorcerer]]s and [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell was a more powerful version of ''[[stoneskin]]''. It allowed the caster or a targeted creature to absorb more damage than the ''stoneskin'' spell. The amount of damage the spell could absorb was determined by the caster's skill level.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
